Articles.Content: Why aren't the advanced manouver nodes showing up on the left of the nav ball.im only getting prograde and retrograde.am I missing something
Yes. You need the right command pod or an experienced pilot.

I have a level 1 pilot and a mk 2 pod.so could it be,

the pilot needs 2 stars?

Level 1 pilots cant Do more than pro or retrograte and the commandpod doesnt matter (the pod only provides torc). If u want more sas Modes u have to Level up ur pilots or install a probecore with the sas modes u want, not every probecore provides all sas modes (the sputnikthing has no sas at all) u can See wich sas modes the probecore provides if u Hit the more info buttom (square at ps4) when hovering with the cursor above the probecore, in the List at the left when u building

Edited February 1, 2018 by PrvDancer85
